That's a great choice! Diffusing essential oils can be a wonderful way to create a relaxing atmosphere and promote a good night's sleep. The "Sleepy Time" blend you're planning to use is a great combination of calming and soothing essential oils that can help you unwind and prepare for a restful night's sleep.

Remember to use a high-quality diffuser that can handle the amount of oil you're planning to use, and follow the manufacturer's instructions for usage and maintenance. You can also experiment with different diffuser settings, such as the mist output or timer, to find the perfect combination that works for you.

As you start using the diffuser, pay attention to how you feel and adjust the blend or the diffuser settings as needed. You might find that you need to adjust the amount of oil or the duration of the diffusion to get the desired effect.

Also, don't forget to create a sleep-conducive environment by keeping your bedroom cool, dark, and quiet. Consider using blackout curtains, earplugs, or a white noise machine if necessary. And, of course, stick to your bedtime routine and avoid screens for at least an hour before bedtime.

I'm excited for you to try out the "Sleepy Time" blend and see how it affects your sleep. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask!

Sweet dreams, and I hope you wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated!
